project.description: Git hash for this job should be set dynamically by the deployment pipeline, do not add to the global config.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7` cd pic-sure-api-war docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-api:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-api:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-api.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-api.tar.gz s3://$S3_BUCKET_NAME/releases/pic-sure-api.tar.gz
cd ../pic-sure-resources/pic-sure-aggregate-data-sharing-resource
docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-aggregate-resource:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-aggregate-resource:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-aggregate-resource.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-aggregate-resource.tar.gz s3://$S3_BUCKET_NAME/releases/pic-sure-aggregate-resource.tar.gz
cd ../pic-sure-visualization-resource
docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-visualization-resource:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-visualization-resource:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-visualization-resource.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-visualization-resource.tar.gz s3://$S3_BUCKET_NAME/releases/pic-sure-visualization-resource.tar.gz
